data.text: @chrisoku_ Saw this somewhere else but it's really disrespectful to both parties. Mac was his own person, he was an artist with his own ambitions, he wasn't just "Ariana Grande's ex". It's also rude in this context because it makes it look like this was somehow her fault when its not

he apparently had issues before they even dated like idgi stop

rest in peace dude and leave his ex out of this that's just 

S O I R R E S P O N S I B L E
